title: Good survival game?
body: I'm looking for a good survival game that's fun and not too realistic. I could never get into Arma or it's mods like original DayZ and such. I see a lot of people playing H1Z1 King of the kill and it looks fun, never hear anything about the survival mode though. I have 7 days to die and I'm not a huge fan of it either. Would you suggest KotK or any other survival game?
